identity.mission: Create a mobile-first, Arabic (RTL) gold trading & marketplace app that exudes luxury, trust, and cultural depth.
principles: Fusion over Imitation: Mix Fintech precision with Jewelry elegance.
Emotion First: Every screen must feel 'expensive' and 'secure'.
Content is King: Gold prices and product details must be legible and beautiful.
Zoom In: High-fidelity product images are the hero.
Negative Space: Use dark space to make gold pop.

layout_strategy.container: max-w-md mx-auto min-h-screen bg-background text-foreground overflow-x-hidden
rtl_rules: Ensure 'dir=rtl' is set on the root html tag.
Use logical properties (ms-*, me-*) instead of left/right where possible, or rely on Tailwind's RTL support.
Icons must be mirrored if directional (e.g., back arrows).

buttons.primary: bg-primary text-primary-foreground hover:bg-primary/90 rounded-full font-bold shadow-[0_0_15px_rgba(212,175,55,0.3)] transition-all

cards.product: bg-[#121212] border border-[#27272A] rounded-xl overflow-hidden hover:border-primary/50 transition-colors group
cards.stat: bg-gradient-to-br from-[#1A1A1A] to-[#0A0A0A] border border-[#27272A] p-4 rounded-xl

navigation.bottom_bar: fixed bottom-0 left-0 right-0 bg-[#0A0A0A]/90 backdrop-blur-lg border-t border-[#27272A] h-16 flex items-center justify-around z-50
navigation.top_bar: sticky top-0 z-40 bg-[#0A0A0A]/80 backdrop-blur-md border-b border-[#27272A] p-4 flex items-center justify-between

inputs.default: bg-[#1A1A1A] border-[#27272A] focus:border-primary focus:ring-primary/20 rounded-lg h-12 text-right placeholder:text-muted-foreground

instructions_to_main_agent: 1. SETUP: Install 'lucide-react' and 'clsx' 'tailwind-merge' if not present.
2. FONTS: Add Google Fonts import for Cairo and Tajawal in index.css.
3. TAILWIND: Update tailwind.config.js to use the specific color palette defined above. Extend the theme, do not overwrite.
4. COMPONENTS: Create a 'BottomNav' component that is fixed at the bottom.
6. MOCK DATA: Create a 'data.js' file with mock products (rings, necklaces, gold bars) using the provided image URLs.
7. RTL: Ensure all flex containers have correct direction. Use 'flex-row-reverse' if needed manually, but 'dir=rtl' on body should handle most.
8. SHADCN: Use Shadcn Card, Button, Input, Badge components. Customize them to match the dark/gold theme.
9. CHARTS: Use Recharts for the Gold Price history graph (AreaChart with gold gradient).
universal_guidelines: Avoid 'AI Slop': No generic gradients. Use solid, deep colors with subtle borders.
Contrast: Ensure text is legible against the dark background. Use White for primary text, Grey-400 for secondary.
Spacing: Use generous padding inside cards (p-4 or p-6).
Touch Targets: All interactive elements must be at least 44x44px.
Data-TestID: Add 'data-testid' to all interactive elements.
